attributes.action: Take effective action to stop the kind of double standards that are allowing radical Muslims to preach hatred against Christians, Jews, Hindus, Atheists and other religions, homosexuals and women, in mosques, schools and community centres, and to sell facist-like propaganda openly, whilst right leaning politicians of perfectly legitimate parties like the BNP are hounded by the press and police, and taken to trial, for making comparitvely mundane and inoffensive comments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister, and government has a duty to protect the freedoms and democratic values of this nation from the spread of radical Islam as exposed so shockingly on Channel 4's Dispatches program 'Undercover Mosque' shown on the evening of January 15th 2007.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
